A store owner has a knapsack with a maximum capacity of 15 kg. He wants to fill it with items of different weights and values. He has 4 items to choose from:

- Item A with a weight of 4 kg and a value of $12
- Item B with a weight of 5 kg and a value of $10
- Item C with a weight of 7 kg and a value of $14
- Item D with a weight of 3 kg and a value of $7

What is the maximum value the store owner can obtain by filling the knapsack with items?
